subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: After 40 turbulent years of coaching, Texas Tech Coach Bob Knight needs 11 victories to break the N.C.A.A. record of 879 set by Dean Smith of North Carolina.
snippet: After 40 turbulent years of coaching, Texas Tech Coach Bob Knight needs 11 victories to break the N.C.A.A. record of 879 set by Dean Smith of North Carolina.
